diamonds.title: Round Brilliant Diamond
diamonds.desc: Certified natural round brilliant diamond with exceptional fire and symmetry.

diamonds.title: Oval Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Elegant oval diamond offering elongated brilliance and premium clarity.

diamonds.title: Emerald Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Step-cut emerald diamond with hall-of-mirrors brilliance and clean facets.

diamonds.title: Pear Shape Diamond
diamonds.desc: Tear-drop shaped diamond combining round and marquise brilliance.

diamonds.title: Marquise Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: High surface-area diamond shape ideal for statement jewelry designs.

diamonds.title: Princess Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Modern square brilliant diamond with sharp corners and high sparkle.

diamonds.title: Radiant Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Brilliant-cut diamond combining emerald shape with strong fire.

diamonds.title: Cushion Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Soft rounded corners with classic vintage brilliance.
